name: Muk
author: Daisuke Ito
flavor_text: A toxic fluids seeps from its body. The fluid instantly kills plants and trees on contact.

poke_body.name: Toxic Sludge
poke_body.effect: At the end of each player’s turn, each of your opponent’s Active Pokémon that has any {G} Energy attached to it is now Poisoned. If that Pokémon is already Poisoned, Toxic Sludge Poké-Body does nothing to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Panic Liquid
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused and can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
